Plot: A group of college students travel to a mysterious island to attend a rave, and end up getting trapped there because it's been taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.
Title: House of the Dead
Writer: Mark A. Altman (story), Dan Bates (story), Dave Parker (screenplay), Mark A. Altman (screenplay)
Actors: Jonathan Cherry, Tyron Leitso, Clint Howard, Ona Grauer
tomatoConsensus: A grungy, disjointed, mostly brainless mess of a film, House of the Dead is nonetheless loaded with unintentional laughs.
